game.name: John W. Beans
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In this 2D top-down action adventure, control John W. Beans and uncover the reptilian conspiracy. Sharpen your angle to hit your target. Use a revolver loaded with pea cans and other peculiar weapons. Ride down a river, explore arid landscapes, underground bases, and discover some secrets.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In this 2D top-down action adventure, control John W. Beans and uncover the reptilian conspiracy. Sharpen your angle to hit your target.
